

```{r}
results %>% filter(grepl("FIFA World Cup",tournament)) %>% mutate(tied=ifelse(home_score == away_score,TRUE,FALSE)) %>% mutate(home_points=ifelse(tied == TRUE,1,ifelse(home_score > away_score,3,0))) %>% mutate(away_points=ifelse(tied == TRUE,1,ifelse(home_score > away_score,0,3))) ->worldCupResults
```
